document_data.name: Teryani Ealoeth
document_data.mainbody: '''Teryani Ealoeth''' was a female [[fey'ri]] [[ranger]] and a daughter of [[Xhalth Dlardrageth]]. She was the chief scout for the [[daemonfey]].
document_data.History:
By [[1374 DR]], Teryani was primarily a spy and assassin, having infiltrated many [[Sembia]]n councils. Teryani assisted [[Sarya Dlardrageth]] in her dealings with [[Borstag Duncastle]].

Later, Teryani was the principal liaison between Sembia and the daemonfey.

Sarya ordered Teryani to kill [[Ilsevele Miritar]], who was trying to make peace between Sembia and the Crusade. The assassination attempt failed thanks to [[Fflar Starbrow Melruth]].

Teryani was one of the few fey'ri to survive their defeat in the [[Cormanthor War]].
document_data.Personality: Teryani had a true talent for disguise and delighted in deceit.
